70010000084592.description:
OVERTOP is an exhilarating game about a little owlet who has fallen from its cozy nest and is determined to return to the peak of the mountain. This game combines charming cartoon graphics with hardcore gameplay that promises countless unforgettable moments!
You’ll need to climb to the very top, overcoming steep cliffs and deep chasms. But be careful—this won’t be an easy task! With each jump, the stakes get higher, and a fall can send you further away from your cherished goal.
Remember the main rule of the feathered club: "The higher you climb, the more painful the fall!" Join us on this adventure, hone your skills, and show what you’re made of!
Are you ready to take on the challenge and bring the owlet home? Then let's soar to new heights!
70010000084592.name: Overtop

70010000087087.description: Solve mysteries, find the lost, help people in trouble, track down criminals and save lives as Biscuit, the one-and-only doggo detective! User her superpowered hearing and scent tracking skills to catch criminals, solve crimes, track the lost and rescue people in mortal danger! As Biscuit, your kindness is a weapon against suffering. Use it.
70010000087087.intro: Sniff. Track. Hunt criminals. Find and rescue victims.
70010000087087.name: Lost and Hound

70010000087411.description:
From the pen of former Nintendo art director turned manga artist, Takaya Imamura, and developers of the Retro Mystery Club series, Happymeal, comes a 16-bit styled retro-future, adventure, infused with RPG elements: OMEGA 6: The Triangle Stars.
 
A Turbulent Quest for the Ultimate Treasure
Follow the adventures of Thunder and Kyla on their spaceship, Omega 6: two androids entrusted with discovering a new planet for the human race to inhabit. But before they find mankind's new home, they must locate the ultimate treasure in some ancient ruins to pay off... a planetary loan?! Their quest will take them to three different planets, the first planet is Impostar, a planet filled with aliens from all four corners of space. The second planet is Igni, a fiery planet with a harsh environment. The third planet is Froslara, a planet as frozen as its residents are rich.
And on every planet, new encounters and incidents await!
 
Over 100 aliens! An adventure combo-meal of mystery & drama!
During your treasure hunt, unexpected encounters await at every turn via random events. You can explore freely while working as a bounty hunter, delivery person, or just shopping for items: how to play is up to you. For the completionists, there's a gallery to record all the intergalactic rogues you meet, sub-missions, and training where you can battle powerful opponents! Contrary to its name, space is very full!

Battle rival treasure hunters and a plethora of aliens in card-based battles!
Treasure attracts trouble, leading to card-based battles with anyone from rival treasure hunters to unknown aliens lurking about. With a set number of cards in your hand, read through your opponent’s strategy and forge a path to absolute victory! Inside your spaceship is a bonsai that bears fruits. Use them to boost your abilities or switch your opponent’s hand with yours. This bonsai also bears Magic Fruits, which will hold tremendous powers, but use them at your own risk!

Story
Earth, somewhere in the distant future.
Thanks to a technology that extends the average lifespan up to about 400 years, humanity lives comfortably, despite the societal problems associated with an aging populace.

Then, one day, a wormhole appeared suddenly near Mars. Via this phenomenon, Earth saw an influx of aliens and, before anybody realized, all the planet’s major cities were occupied by these migratory extra-terrestrials.
Concerned with this situation, Dr Victor Franklin, a leading researcher on longevity, decides to search for a second Earth. In order to that humanity may thrive once again thrive once their new home was found, he creates two androids, Thunder and Kyla, and sends them in on their quest aboard the Omega 6 spacecraft.

And thus began Thunder and Kyla's long and extraordinary adventures.
Creators

Story & Art by Takaya Imamura
Takaya Imamura joined Nintendo in 1989 and worked on the art direction for series like Star Fox™, F-Zero™ and The Legend of Zelda™. He left Nintendo in 2021 to work as a lecturer at the International Professional University of Technology in Osaka. Being an illustrator, he also launched his first manga Omega 6 in France in October 2022, via Omaké Books.

Sound by Shinobu Amayake
Shinobu Amayake composed music for Nintendo games such as Stunt Race FX™, NES™ Open Tournament Golf, Wario’s Woods™ and Pokémon™ Ranger: Shadows of Almia. After leaving Nintendo, she now works as a pianist and a jazz vocalist performing in Kyoto and Osaka.
70010000087411.intro: OMEGA 6 The Triangle Stars is an adventure game with 16-bit styling, based on the manga by former Nintendo® art director, Takaya Imamura.
70010000087411.name: Omega 6 The Triangle Stars

70010000088269.description:
An unremarkable princess in an unremarkable castle has been kidnapped by a group of mysterious ninjas. Luckily for her, a young ninja named Casey is aware of the situation, and embarks on a mission to save her because... he is the Ninja of Justice!

Join Casey and learn the art of ninjutsu as he explores a land full of secrets and dangerous enemies! 


Features:
* Available in English for the first time!
* 2 game modes: choose between a Quest Mode that includes light RPG elements such as branching stages, a level-up system, equipment and secondary quests, or an Action Mode that focuses on classic brawler action
* Local co-op 2-player mode
* Rewind/Turbo function: repeat something until you achieve perfection, or speed things up
* Save state function: save wherever you want to in the game, and restart from that exact point
* Screen filters: select from several filters to modify how the game looks (retro-style monitor, black-and-white, etc.)
* Gallery: view images from the original game’s manual and box design
* Cheats function: activate cheats that will make your mission a lot easier (infinite lives, invulnerability, etc.)
* Jukebox: listen to the 30 music tracks included in the game whenever you want
70010000088269.intro: The 16-bit classic comes to the West for the very first time!
70010000088269.name: Justice Ninja Casey

70010000091091.description:
In “VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival,” you find yourself as a nomadic explorer cast into the mysterious Void, a world with its own secrets and surprises. This enigmatic realm invites you to uncover its hidden mysteries and navigate its unique landscapes, each filled with challenges and unexpected encounters.

Construct and enhance your sailing vessel to better equip yourself for the journey ahead. Starting with a simple raft, you’ll develop it into a formidable vessel complete with a ship’s hold, mast, and captain’s cabin. Customize your vessel with various objects, from storages and workbenches to decorations, making it truly your own.
As you traverse the surreal terrains of the Void, you’ll confront numerous foes and navigate through ever-changing environments.

Features:
• Uncover Hidden Mysteries: Explore the enigmatic Void, a world filled with secrets and surprises, offering unique landscapes and unexpected encounters..
• Build and Customize Your Vessel: Start with a simple raft and transform it into a formidable sailing vessel, complete with ship’s hold, mast, and captain’s cabin. Personalize your ship with storages, workbenches, and decorations.
• Challenging Exploration: Navigate through surreal and ever-changing terrains, each filled with distinct challenges and adversaries to overcome.
• Engage in Combat: Confront numerous foes as you journey through the Void, testing your survival skills and strategic thinking.
• Dynamic Environment: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed world that evolves and changes, ensuring each journey is unique.
• Strategic Upgrades: Enhance your vessel and equipment to better prepare for the adventures and dangers that lie ahead.
• Immersive Storyline: Engage with a captivating narrative that unfolds as you progress, revealing the deep lore and history of the Void.
• Customizable Experience: Tailor your gameplay with a variety of objects and enhancements, making each playthrough a personalized adventure.

Uncover unexpected twists along the way, the Void promises an unparalleled adventure waiting to be experienced, testing your survival skills and resilience.
70010000091091.intro: Build, explore and survive on floating islands!
70010000091091.name: VoidCraft Island Chronicles: Sky Survival

70010000091441.description:
Engage in high-intensity combat, strategize with your squad, and outsmart your opponents in the ultimate test of tactical warfare.

In “Call of Warzone”, you’ll dive into fast-paced, team-based skirmishes where every decision counts. As part of a 5-person squad, your mission is to deplete the enemy’s score before they take yours down in a battle for dominance. With 1000 points on the line, the stakes are higher than ever.

Key Features:

– Team-Based Strategy: Command your team through intense combat, using smart tactics to outmaneuver the opposition.

– Score-Based Combat: Every kill impacts the score—eliminate the enemy and protect your team’s points to secure victory.

– Varied Combat Zones: Face off in five unique, dynamic environments, each offering different challenges and opportunities for strategy.

– Weapon Variety: Choose from over 20 different weapons, from rifles to explosives, and tailor your loadout to fit your playstyle.

Get ready to prove your worth in “Call of Warzone”, where skill, strategy, and teamwork determine who stands tall in the warzone. A thrilling solo-player experience that combines strategic action and immersive gameplay. 

Will you rise to the challenge and lead your squad to victory?
70010000091441.intro: Fight with strategy, dominate the battlefield, claim your victory.
70010000091441.name: Call of Warzone

70010000092169.description:
Capture the Moment!

Embark on a thrilling journey with Kin’s dream job. You just got hired during your job interview.
Can you survive the challenges of your first day at a new job? 
Will you earn your boss’ respect or will you be fired on the spot after a mess up?

Sometimes unexpected opportunities present themselves. Embark on a quest to the top, armed with nothing but a camera!


Features:
* Photo Gallery: You can unlock the 10 different pictures and view them at any time!
* Unique Storyline: Join Kin in his quest for success as he collects pictures of all his beautiful co-workers.
* Top-Down Perspective: Explore the vibrant and dynamic world of Foto Boy through a visually engaging top-down perspective.
* Lite Puzzles: light-hearted puzzles that add an extra layer of challenge to the game. Solve them to unlock new areas and advance in the storyline.
* Character Dialogue: Discover more as Kin interacts with a diverse cast of characters.
* Take pictures: Unleash your inner photographer!
70010000092169.intro: Are you ready to capture the beauty and climb your way to success?
70010000092169.name: Foto Boy: A New Job

70010000092672.description:
Soar through the skies and embrace the art of flight in Art of Glide 3, an enchanting open-world exploration game that invites you to experience the freedom of flying as a majestic eagle.

Explore a stunning, procedurally generated world of idyllic farmlands. Glide effortlessly through the skies, weaving between trees, tractors and barns.

Your mission: uncover 20 unique landmarks hidden across the expansive landscape. From charming rustic barns to wind-farms, every discovery reveals a new piece of the world and is one step closer to completion.

With its serene atmosphere and soothing soundtrack, Art of Glide 3 offers a relaxing yet rewarding gameplay experience perfect for players of all ages.

Are you ready to spread your wings and master the Art of Glide?
70010000092672.intro: Spread your wings and discover the beauty of a boundless world, one landmark at a time.
70010000092672.name: Art of Glide 3

70010000093043.description:
Get ready to lock, load, and double the chaos! Double Dangerous is a high-octane third-person shooter that flips the script on traditional gameplay. Wield dual guns and unleash a storm of bullets in any direction—regardless of where your character is facing. Run forward while blasting behind you, pull off wild one-arm shots, or take down enemies mid-dive in slow motion. The choice is yours, and the fun is limitless.

Features:
Innovative Shooting Mechanics: Aim and fire freely in all directions, adding strategy and flair to every firefight.

10 Unique Worlds: Explore diverse environments, each packed with vibrant visuals and dynamic challenges.

Four Difficulty Modes: From Easy to the insane “Nuts” mode, push your skills to the limit with extra missions and escalating intensity.

Medals and Unlockables: Earn medals in every mode to unlock exclusive skins and customization options.

Arcade-Inspired Style: Enjoy a blend of cartoonish charm and sleek realism, brought to life with stunning lighting and dynamic sound effects.

Whether you’re a casual player looking for a good time or a hardcore gamer chasing the ultimate challenge, Double Dangerous delivers non-stop action, endless replayability, and the satisfaction of outgunning the odds.
70010000093043.intro: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!
70010000093043.name: Double Dangerous

70010000093305.description:
Enjoy a different and ingenious adventure in Mycelium Heaven where a fungus with a very peculiar diet will help save its home.
Craft your best strategy in this war and overcome levels where you'll discover new and complex mechanics that will test your logic.
70010000093305.intro: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.
70010000093305.name: Mycelium Heaven

70050000053506.description:
This DLC grants access to 10 songs including Touhou original "The World Is Made in an Adorable Way"

Release is scheduled for February, 2025.
Check out the official page for details on the songs.
Official Page: https://danmaku.jp/en/
70050000053506.intro: Extra Song Pack with 10 songs that include the original "The World Is Made in an Adorable Way"
70050000053506.name: Extra Song Pack 6

70070000023823.description:
Train Traffic Manager isn't your grandpa's model railway set. Think fast, plan faster, and keep those trains from turning into flaming metal confetti. In this strategy-puzzle game, you're in charge of everything from switches and signals to drawbridges and, oh yeah, preventing cataclysmic train disasters.

Take on over 80 levels across diverse environments that range from sunny desertscapes to mysterious midnight scenes. It's more fun than a cactus in your caboose!

Each environment has its own unique challenges. Deserts have meteor showers (because of course they do), forests have fallen trees (what's a forest without a little lumber?), winters bring the freeze to your switches, and at midnight, well, you'll just have to see.

And if the chaos of normal mode gets too much, take a breather in endless mode. No objectives, just you, the tracks, and an infinite number of trains. It's the zen garden of train management!

Ready to dive into the madness? Take control of the tracks and show that chaos who's boss in Train Traffic Manager.

And remember: don't fall asleep at your post!

This bundle includes base game, DLC #1 - Subterranean Switch-Up, DLC #2 - Classic Tracks Reimagined, DLC #3 - Fleet Upgrade - Jet & Circus and DLC #4 - Fleet Upgrade - SciFi & Horror with:

- 10 brand new underground maps that challenge you to navigate the dimly lit and intricate tunnels.

- 10 of the best campaign levels, transformed and remixed for an even more engaging challenge.

- Two New skins - with the vibrant colors of the circus or the sleek design of a jet.

- Two New skins - two uniquely themed trains - embrace the eerie with the Horror skin, or embark into the future with the SciFi skin
70070000023823.intro: All Aboard the Chaos & Strategy Express!
70070000023823.name: Train Traffic Manager GOTY Edition

70070000026721.description:
In S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win!

Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

Game includes:
15+ STAGES
30+ WEAPONS
30+ GALLERY ITEMS
60+ SPECIAL ACHIEVEMENTS 

Become a hunter, mount your scope, and fight for our freedom!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Weaponry Upgrade, Elite Arsenal, Target Acquired and Neon Strike with:

- With the Expansion Pack you can fight and survive the zombie apocalypse in a brand new game mode!
- Play new maps or revisit old ones with new weapons.
-PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm 
-FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation 
-SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy 
-RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design 
-BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west 
-SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle 
-RIF-16-DOT rifle: a high-tech rifle with a dot sight for quick target acquisition 
-SN-200-FOR sniper rifle: a powerful and accurate sniper rifle for long-range engagements 
-SN-300-FFD sniper rifle: a versatile sniper rifle for special assignments
-SN-400-SKY sniper rifle: a sleek design combined with cutting-edge technology
-SHG-12-AQA: an aquatic-themed shotgun, with a blast like an ocean wave
-UZ-90-CLD: a frosty Uzi, delivering a cool demise
-SN-1200-NEO: a sniper rifle straight out of a neon dream, precision only matched by its glowing elegance.
70070000026721.name: S.N.I.P.E.R. - Hunter Scope Full Edition

70070000026722.description:
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen? 

In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task! 

You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.

Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips! 

Invest your earnings into upgrading your restaurant and become a breakfast magnate!

Bon appetite!

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2, Endless Mode and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 45 new levels to explore
• 8 new Achievements to complete
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family. 
• endless gameplay mode

NOTE: to play the Multiplayer Mode DLC, each player will need their own set of Joy-Con™ or an additional Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller.
70070000026722.intro:
It's almost time for breakfast!
Go and prove that your breakfast bar deserves its fame!
70070000026722.name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon Definitive Edition

70070000026724.description:
Discover the perfect balance of strategy and skill in Snooker Fever.  This game brings the classic snooker experience to the Nintendo Switch™, whether you're a seasoned snooker player or just picking up a cue for the first time.

With 10 beautifully crafted tables, customizable cues, and CPU opponents that keep you on your toes, every game feels fresh. Take on the challenge solo or invite a friend for some local competition. Focus on sinking that perfect shot, while the stunning 3D visuals capture the atmosphere of a real snooker hall.

Snooker Fever has all the tools you need to master the game, enjoy some friendly competition, and just have a great time.

Key Features:

10 different tables 
15 custom cues 
3 levels of opponents
Local multiplayer 
Smooth controls and realistic 3D graphics

This bundle includes base game and Expansion Pack #2 with:

five new table designs and five sleek cue styles
70070000026724.intro: The classic pool experience, right at home!
70070000026724.name: Snooker Fever Premium Edition

70070000026743.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of bowling with Bowling Fever!

Test your skills in countless game modes, visit amazingly realistic 3D locations, play fantastic mini-games and discover dozens of new bowling balls and pins!

Need a hand? Various power-ups and boosts will help you to meet the challenges.

A bowling game has never been this exciting!

- Fantastic bowling alleys from around the world.
- Fantastic 20+ balls, pins and lanes to show off!
- Multiple mini-games to complete.
- Multiple game modes to play!

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #3 and expansion pack #4 with:

-20 new bowling ball styles
70070000026743.intro: Fire up "Bowling Fever" and be carried away by the emotions!
70070000026743.name: Bowling Fever Discovery Edition

70070000026750.description:
Get ready to fuel up for the ultimate off-road thrill with Buggy Off-Road Racing! Dive into this exhilarating journey as you navigate through the wild landscapes of the USA, Europe, and Asia. It's all about high-octane races where your bravery and skills are in the spotlight.

Dive into 12 off-road tracks
Take on 3 worldwide racing challenges
Unlock and upgrade 4 powerful buggies
Experience dynamic racing modes

Gear up to skid, drift, and accelerate over breathtaking turns and leaps. Are you up for making your mark and racing towards triumph? 

Jump into the driver's seat in Buggy Off-Road Racing and turn the whole world into your racing arena.

This bundle includes base game, Custom Cruisers #1 and Custom Cruisers #4 with:

-2 new skins for each Buggy
70070000026750.intro: The Ultimate Dirt Track Challenge on your Nintendo Switch™!
70070000026750.name: Buggy Off-Road Racing Super Edition

70070000026773.description:
Enter the battlefield in "Tank vs. Tank", an explosive clash of steel titans. 

This isn't just a game; it's war. Life and death hang in the balance, demanding your full attention. Every decision, from the drive to the deadly aim, could mean the difference between victory and defeat. Outwit, outshout, and outlast your opponents to ensure it's them, not you, who bite the dust.

Your choices are crucial - every move, every shot counts towards victory or defeat.

Enhance your tank with cutting-edge upgrades and face off against cunning opponents.

Use the vast arsenal at your disposal, make each shot your path to glory.

Ready your cannon, refine your tactics, and enter the battle. 

Victory awaits the bold – are you prepared to claim it?

This bundle includes base game and "War Paint #3" DLC, with:

-4 unique tank skins and 4 country flags, allowing you to customize your armored vehicles.

Grab it now and roll out in style!
70070000026773.intro: Battle of the Tanks: Aim, Ready.... Fire!
70070000026773.name: Tank vs Tank Prime Edition

70070000026825.description:
Get ready to test your aim and precision in Darts Fever, the ultimate darts game experience!

Take on classic and exciting game modes like 201, 301, 501, Cricket, and Around the Clock. Whether you're sharpening your solo skills or challenging up to 3 friends in local multiplayer, Darts Fever delivers non-stop dart-throwing fun. 

An innovative aim mechanic and stunning 3D graphics make every game an authentic dart-throwing experience. And with motion-controlled Joy-Con™ support, you can truly feel the action as you throw your darts with realistic movement, just like you’re playing in a real-life pub match!

Grab your darts, take aim, and hit the bullseye!

6 unique board designs
10 custom dart styles
5 game modes
Single-player or up to 4 players multi-player
Motion control Joy-Con support
Realistic 3d Graphics and throwing mechanic

This bundle includes base game, Stylish Precision #1 and Stylish Precision #2 with:

10 brand-new dart designs
70070000026825.intro: Step Up to the toe line!
70070000026825.name: Darts Fever Deluxe Edition

70070000026830.description:
Get behind the wheel in Formula Racing Pro 2025 and experience the excitement of high-speed racing! With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, this game is perfect for racers of all ages. 

This thrilling racing game puts you right in the driver’s seat of fast-paced Formula racing action.  Feel the rush as you speed through corners, overtake opponents, and navigate each twist and turn of the track with precision.  Accessible, fun, and incredibly addictive!

Choose your car, perfect your timing, and race your way to glory. The track is calling, and the thrill of victory is just one race away!

This bundle includes base game and expansion pack #1 with:

This pack introduces three stunning new liveries for your race cars, adding style and personality to your high-speed adventures.
70070000026830.intro: Feel the Speed, Own the Track!
70070000026830.name: Formula Racing Pro 2025 Extended Edition

70010000058619.description:
Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world!

A new hero is desperately needed in the world of fairy stones for chaos is slowly invading the peaceful and beautiful land of Middengeard. Can you uncover the source of this disturbance by collecting all the scattered fairy stones and restore peace to the land?

Dozens of unique and hungry monsters and bosses are lurking to hunt you, all with specific attributes, so pick your weapons wisely, targeting their weak points.

Make full use of tons of automatically generated equipment, including sword, helmets, armors, and shields as the same weapon will never appear twice. For weapons, there are one-handed and two-handed swords, bombs, bows and much more.

Travel over a vast field map and explore dangerous dungeons! In villages, you’ll encounter helpful people who’ll give you clues for your adventure; sell items and offer rare rewards for clearing quests.

Enter dungeons, fight hordes of villains while solving puzzles and lay your hands on precious treasures protected by vicious beasts.
70010000058619.intro:
Dive into a nostalgic retro 3D DOT RPG world!
A significant level of suspense awaits you.
70010000058619.name: Fable of Fairy Stones

70010000091550.description:
Step into The Pools, a psychological horror experience set in the hauntingly surreal “Poolrooms.” Explore an endless maze of waterlogged halls, shimmering lights, and unsettling silence. There are no monsters—only the eerie beauty of liminal spaces, where the familiar becomes alien and the peaceful turns oppressive.

Key Features
• Dynamic Water Effects: Walking slows in water, and ripples hint at unseen forces nearby.
• Immersive Soundscapes: Distorted echoes and muffled sounds adapt to your surroundings, enhancing tension.
• Surreal Architecture: Endless corridors, submerged stairs, and shadowy corners evoke mystery and unease.
• Shifting Environments: Each chapter transforms, revealing new secrets and unsettling surprises.
• Navigation Challenges: Find your way through maze-like paths with no map or guidance.

Lose yourself in The Pools—an experience where every step pulls you deeper into the unknown. Will you uncover its mysteries or succumb to its quiet terror?
70010000091550.intro: Anomalies await you in the shadows of The Pools.
70010000091550.name: THE POOLS

70070000026902.description:
Get ready for an action-packed challenge where every strike brings you closer to victory! Join friends or family in up to four-player matches, compete in thrilling tournaments against top bowlers from across the lanes, and bowl in amazing alleys with cool views. Only the best players make it to the final rounds – will you be the one holding the trophy?

Features:
• Premium gear - Choose from 6 new pieces of gear with powerful buffs!
• Powerful Balls - Equip 6 new bowling balls with unique trails and more power!
• Extra currency - Get 100K coins and 4K gems to buy and upgrade your gear!
• Local multiplayer - Compete against your friends and family in matches for up to 4 players!
• Motion Controls - Feel like you're truly bowling with motion controls that respond to every move!
• Exciting Tournaments - Compete in rounds and aim for the finals, where only the best bowlers make it.
• Customize Your Character - Personalize your bowler with cool gear, such as gloves and shoes.
• Challenging Arenas - Unlock amazing new alleys with fun twists as you level up.
• Powerful Skills - Use active and passive skills to boost your chances of winning!

Skyline Bowling isn’t just about throwing the ball; it’s about using the right gear and clever strategies! Boost your skills with special gear like gloves that give your ball extra spin or shoes that make it roll faster. Choose from different bowling balls, and earn experience to unlock new tournaments and amazing bowling alleys with fun surprises! Collect skills to help you get even more strikes. Are you ready to bowl your way to the top?

Get ready to roll, aim, and strike your way to victory in Skyline Bowling!
70070000026902.intro: Strike out the competition and become the ultimate bowling champ! Ready to roll?
70070000026902.name: Skyline Bowling: Complete Edition

70070000026906.description:
Get ready for non-stop fun in Stacky Dash! Slide to collect tiles, build paths, and race through colorful levels full of exciting surprises. Dodge blasting cannons, and zip through portals as you conquer each tricky stage!

Features:
• Premium skins - Play with 10 epic skins!
• Unique tiles - Choose from 14 new tiles!
• Extra resources - Get 5K coins, 1K gems and 30 keys!
• Exciting Levels - Tons of fun puzzles that get trickier as you go!
• Crazy Challenges - Dodge cannon fire, zoom through portals, and avoid traps.
• Animal Rescue - Find cute animals and grow your zoo!
• Timed Mode - Race the clock for an extra challenge and rewards!
• Customization - Unlock awesome skins for your character and tiles.

Save adorable animals to grow your own zoo and take on timed challenges to test your speed. With tons of cool skins to unlock, every level is packed with energy and fun!

Solve your way through endless puzzles in Stacky Dash!
70070000026906.intro: Dash your hero across the mazes, stack the tiles higher and higher, and reach for the skies!
70070000026906.name: Stacky Dash: Complete Edition

70010000088789.description:
Lights, camera, action! In Destino Indomable, you're the rising star cast as the lead in a telenovela! Dive into a wild visual novel inspired by the most dramatic Latin soap operas, complete with humor, drama, romance, and more! Customize your character and play through 5 thrilling episodes where your choices impact the story, your relationships, and the show's ratings. Discover gossip, unravel mysteries, and captivate the audience with an unforgettable performance!

Features:

- A telenovela-themed visual novel that brings Latin drama to life.
- Character popularity system that changes screen time based on your choices.
- Customizable lead actress with clothes, hairstyles, and accessories.
- Five romance paths with unique storylines and mysteries.
- Multiple endings, with heroes becoming villains, and wild plot twists.
- Over 15 hours of story, packed with secrets to uncover on each playthrough!
70010000088789.intro: Step into the drama and stardom of Destino Indomable!
70010000088789.name: Destino Indomable

70070000026560.description:
This bundle includes 2 Bullet Hell Action Roguelites: Genome Guardian and Keeper's Toll. There is over 100 hours of content between the two games!

**Genome Guardian**
COMBINE WEAPONS in the microscopic turret shooter roguelite with macroscopic depth. Survive 6 modes using an astounding array of turrets, perks, mutations and power-ups on this psychedelic journey to the heart of the abyss.

**Keeper's Toll**
Delve into an action-packed roguelite brimming with challenge and despair. Survive against an onslaught of relentless hordes and grueling bosses with skill-based ARPG gameplay. Embrace the darkness and cleanse these cursed lands.
70070000026560.name: Bullet Hell Action Roguelites

70010000074829.description:
The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’. 

BECOME THE MASTERMIND
For the very first time in the history of the franchise, assume the role of Carmen Sandiego herself! Dive headfirst into her world of espionage, experiencing her escapades firsthand as you outwit VILE operatives.

GEAR UP
Carmen Sandiego wouldn't be the legendary thief she is without tools! Glide effortlessly through the air with her trusty glider, swing from building to building with her grappling hook, and see in the dark with her night vision and thermal imaging goggles.

TRAVEL THE GLOBE
From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world's most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.

SOLVE CAPERS
Sharpen your detective skills as you gather clues, decipher codes, and tackle a variety of mini-games to outsmart VILE's most elusive operatives. But beware, time is of the essence! Stay sharp, think fast, and act decisively to crack safes, hack into systems, and master the art of lockpicking before it's too late.

CAPTURE VILE
Gather clues and compare them to dossiers to uncover VILE operatives. Is their hair black, red, or do they have blue eyes? Use your deductive skills to narrow down suspects. But remember, a warrant is essential before making any arrests! Will you crack the case and bring VILE to justice, or will they evade capture?
70010000074829.intro: The world's greatest thief is back
70010000074829.name: Carmen Sandiego

70010000080261.description:
Enter the world of Everhood.
Discover the color of your soul and what lies beyond the river of death in a strange land. Accompany a mysterious celestial Raven who has deemed you worthy of slaying the Mind Dragon.

Features
-Master the music-based battles with over 100 songs!
-Voyage through a transcendental journey across 8-10 hours
-Enter a wild universe with mind-bending visuals
-Conquer the unconquerable
-Custom Battle Editor Support
-Make funny friends!
70010000080261.intro: AN UNCONVENTIONAL ARPG where you battle enemies through musical encounters.
70010000080261.name: Everhood 2

70010000087775.description: Dodge! Strike back! This is a fast-paced barrage arcade game. Move the character to dodge bullets. Pick the right time to strike bullets back and destroy enemies to get gold coins. Unlock more characters and powerful skills. Keep challenging yourself to get higher scores and rankings.
70010000087775.intro: dodge the enemy's bullets or strike them back. Use the enemy's attacks to destroy them!
70010000087775.name: Ball-it Hell

70050000053248.description:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike! Greet some familiar faces in the exclusive anniversary caper and become a master of disguise with some exclusive in-game outfits. 

Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes: 

- Anniversary Caper "Where in the World"
- Cosmetic Skin - Classic outfit
- Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle outfit
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Digital Official Art Book
70050000053248.name: Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition DLC

70070000025440.description:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike! Greet some familiar faces in the exclusive anniversary caper and become a master of disguise with some exclusive in-game outfits. 
Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes: 
- Anniversary Caper "Where in the World"
- Cosmetic Skin - Classic outfit
- Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle outfit
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Digital Official Art Book

The scarlet super-thief, Carmen Sandiego, is back! Don Carmen's signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilize high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capture VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test, whether it's in the narrative-driven main campaign or the classic mode ""The ACME Files."

BECOME THE MASTERMIND
For the very first time in the history of the franchise, assume the role of Carmen Sandiego herself! Dive headfirst into her world of espionage, experiencing her escapades firsthand as you outwit VILE operatives.

GEAR UP
Carmen Sandiego wouldn't be the legendary thief she is without tools! Glide effortlessly through the air on her trusty glider, swing from building to building with her grappling hook, and see in the dark with her night vision and thermal imaging goggles.

TRAVEL THE GLOBE
From the bustling streets of Rio de Janeiro to the majestic landmarks of Tokyo, embark on a whirlwind tour of the world's most iconic destinations. With stunning visuals and immersive environments, every location comes to life, inviting you to explore, discover, and unravel the secrets that lie within.

SOLVE CAPERS
Sharpen your detective skills as you gather clues, decipher codes, and tackle a variety of mini-games to outsmart VILE's most elusive operatives. But beware -- time is of the essence! Stay sharp, think fast, and act decisively to crack safes, hack into systems, and master the art of lockpicking before it's too late.

CAPTURE VILE
Gather clues and compare them to Dossiers to uncover VILE operatives. Is their hair black, red, or do they have blue eyes? Use your deductive skills to narrow down suspects. But remember, a warrant is essential before making any arrests! Will you crack the case and bring VILE to justice, or will they evade capture?"
70070000025440.intro: Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike!
70070000025440.name: Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition

70010000090431.description:
Alruna is a dryad in a dying world – a spirit of life in the land of the dead. The earth is sucked dry. There is only The Sprawl. Poor, bedraggled skele-men dot the Wasteland of the Necro-Industrialists and shuffle endlessly back and forth in a toiling mockery of life. But are they the real enemy? Or do the skeletons suffer just as much as the dryads under the domination of the Necro-Industrialists?

And salvation? Is it possible? Dead men yearn for Heaven. But the dead can only dig...
70010000090431.intro: The heart that beats, beats brutally
70010000090431.name: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists

70010000090779.description:
Get ready for another enigmatic and challenging adventure with O.W.L Projekt 2, a 3D isometric puzzle game that will test your mind and logic skills. Once again controlling Elysion, a young being created in a mysterious experiment, you will face the enigmatic Watchers in a journey to escape and uncover secrets.

Armed with the powerful Sanctum Staff, Elysion can move objects and overcome obstacles, offering a unique and immersive gaming experience. Challenge yourself through 50 meticulously designed levels as you manipulate blocks, drag platforms, discover secret passages and climb ladders in rotating dioramas, with new mechanics introduced as difficulty gradually ramps up!

• Help guide a young experimental being as he is pursued by the mysterious Watchers!
• Overcome 50 environmental puzzles of increasing complexity and difficulty.
• Clear a path for Elysion using the power of his Sanctum Staff!
• Manipulate platforms, climb and more to traverse rotatable isometric dioramas.
• Enjoy a minimalistic narrative through organic storytelling!
70010000090779.intro: Guide a young being’s daring adventure as you puzzle your way through diorama-style landscapes!
70010000090779.name: O.W.L Projekt 2

70010000091968.description:
Cyber Quest is a retro deck building game. Assemble a ragtag crew of hackers, mercenaries, and street-savvy rogues to take on the most feared crime gangs in the city. Each encounter is a high-stakes battle of wits and tactics as you pit your crew against rival factions in this intense card-based rpg.

- Collect and customize an arsenal of powerful cards. Build your deck to exploit enemy weaknesses, unleash devastating combos, and outmaneuver your foes.
- Level up your crew members, unlock new powers, and transform your team into an unstoppable force.
- Roguelike gamplay. Explore the sprawling cityscape, face randomized challenges, and adapt to new foes.
- Enhance your cards by changing their cost, damage, or color. Tailor your deck to suit your strategy.
- Groove to the finest fusion of funk and electronic music.
- Enjoying playing offline games? No connect required here. Play anywhere, anytime.
70010000091968.intro: A retro deck building game. Assemble a ragtag crew of hackers, mercenaries, and street-savvy rogues to take on the most feared crime gangs.
70010000091968.name: Cyber Quest

70050000055304.description:
Here is what Sprout Valley: Friends Forever expansion has to offer all farmers:

- 11 new friends that can be found while visiting new islands. Each of them has their own gift preferences, hobbies, unique style, and they’re all different kids of creatures - from buffalos to frogs!
- Each new islands dweller has a questline, at the end of which await new workspaces, items, and rewards.
- New boat colors and decorations to unlock.
- And new looks for containers like Nico’s chest, backpack, the mailbox, etc!
70050000055304.intro: These new fluffy friends will win over your heart!
70050000055304.name: Friends Forever

70070000026723.description:
Start a new journey and see how this is more than just a farming game.

ADORABLE CAT
Help cute cat Niko escape from the big city and settle with him on the Ostara archipelago. Just choose an island and start your new life! His knowledge and passion for nature will let you turn this island into the most stunning place on Earth. 

GAME ECONOMY
Your garden will produce many products you can sell and earn money. Remember to order unnecessary seeds, saplings and equipment to make your garden grow even bigger. Manage space on your island and pick the best place for your crops. Don’t forget to water them every day!

VARIOUS ACTIVITIES
It’s your choice what to do. Developing your skills by farming, mining, foraging, crafting, fishing will let you unlock new recipes and abilities. Make sure to unlock all of them and explore all possibilities in the game.

This bundle includes a total of 8 DLCs: Lovely, Easter, Cows, Summer, Nico's Skins, New Friend: Momo, Spray Paint, and the largest expansion ever created for Sprout Valley – Friends Forever.

KEY FEATURES
- Charming 2D pixel art graphics
- More than 20 hours of amazing gameplay
- Outfit customization
- Your own pets!
- Simple and clear economy system
- Lovely music track
70070000026723.intro: Make your dream of settling on an island and growing a beautiful garden come true!
70070000026723.name: Sprout Valley Friends Forever Expansion

70010000048820.description:
A hero's destiny is written in the Stars
The legendary Konami JRPGs Suikoden I and Suikoden II have now been remastered in HD!

The Story of Suikoden I
A once renowned hero turns into a violent tyrant, and an empire falls into decline.
A Liberation Army is rising up in an act of rebellion against an oppressive rule.
One by one the 108 stars of Destiny gather to shape the course of history.

The Story of Suikoden II
Our story's hero and his friend Jowy are members of the Unicorn Youth Brigade, which participated in a drawn-out border dispute between the Highland Kingdom and the City-States of Jowston .
A few months earlier, a truce agreement was signed between the two forces, both of which were happy to see an end to the fighting.
However, hidden under the momentary peace the fires of a new war continued to smolder…

Features of Suikoden I & Suikoden II HD
・All background illustrations have been upgraded to HD
・Updated effects breathe new life into the pixel art animation
・New environmental sounds effects to immerse yourself in this fantasy world
・Battle SFX are also now HD and add a new level of realism
・Newly added auto-save
・Battle Fast Forward
・Conversation Log
70010000048820.intro: The Legend of Suikoden I and II returns, remastered in HD!
70010000048820.name: Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars

70010000075992.description:
Follow the final days of Michelle as she battles to break the curse placed on her by a powerful archdemon looking for love. Help (or hinder!) the lives of curious residents in Michelle’s bustling London borough as she pursues freedom from her own untimely demise.

Sorry We're Closed is a fusion of nostalgic survival horror with a new perspective on combat, combining  atmospheric environments with fixed-camera angles and the thrill of arcade-style first person shooting. Collect items and manage resources to help Michelle survive. Optional tank controls are available for those who enjoy the classic survival horror experience.

Michelle’s time is split between the perilous demon world and mingling with the locals on her residential street. Everyone’s battling their own inner demons and through Michelle you can help guide them. Multiple endings are available through RPG-style dialogue interactions with the extravagant cast.

Open Your Third Eye: See two worlds at once with the gift of Michelle’s demonic curse.
Your Choices Matter: Multiple endings are available depending on the dialogue choices you make with an eclectic cast of characters.
Fixed Camera Exploration: Experience the cinematic charm of classic survival horror camera angles.
First Person Arcade Shooting: Combat is up close and personal as you target enemy weak points.
Manage Your Inventory: Straightforward health and ammo resource management. Find items to solve puzzles and exchange with NPCs.
Modern and Tank Controls: Optionally play the entire experience using authentic tank controls.
Gyroscope Support: Turn on gyroscope aiming for further control during combat.
Accessibility Options: Remappable controls, aim assist, no-hold button toggles, logbook, infinite healing and additional comfort options are available.
70010000075992.intro: Sorry We're Closed is an eccentric story-driven survival horror game about angels and demons that mixes fixed-camera exploration and arcade-style shooting.
70010000075992.name: Sorry We're Closed

70010000076070.description:
Boot up for a byte-sized adventure in MainFrames, a clever and charming platformer that plays out entirely within the windows and desktop of a PC monitor.

Join Floppy, an adventurous program seeking to find their place in the digital world, while cheeky daemons maintain the system’s balance, always managing to stay out of your sight. Navigate a maze of diverse PC frames, meet quirky and colorful characters, and uncover secrets that bring Floppy closer to piecing together their function. Each interaction injects humor and warmth into their journey, making every moment a byte of delight.

In MainFrames, you'll guide Floppy by rearranging program windows to create new pathways, jumping between frames to navigate the digital world. Every area you explore is rich with distinct visual styles, innovative mechanics, and hidden secrets. Complemented by a chill lo-fi soundtrack, the game’s charming puzzles and platforming challenges provide a rewarding experience that's hard to log off from.

MainFrames will keep you logged in for a short and sweet journey, ensuring that you won't want to press the escape key on this enchanting adventure. Each level is an upgrade you won't want to miss. Get ready to dive into an unforgettable digital quest!
70010000076070.intro: MainFrames invites you to meet Floppy and to browse a clever and charming platformer. You won’t want to press the escape key on this cozy outing!
70010000076070.name: MainFrames

70010000081341.description:
The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace. 

What to expect: 

• TACTICAL DEPTH: Freeze the opponent first? Push them into an obstacle? Or use your flame breath to roast multiple enemies at once? Use a range of accessible tactics to outsmart your opponent.

• GRIPPING BATTLES: Explosive attacks with spectacular effects make the meticulously crafted world of Eldrador quake. 

• FANTASTICAL WORLDS: Explore four diverse, open locations: the seething-hot Lava World, the dangerously cold Ice World, the indestructible Stone World and the overgrown Jungle World. 

• HUMOROUS STORY: Join quirky characters through over 100 levels in a light-hearted tale brimming with charm and humour. 

• MIGHTY CREATURES: Assemble your favourite team of 20 creatures. Each creature has unique skills and grows stronger with every battle. 

• EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER: Easy for children and newcomers to the genre to pick up, while also offering a challenge to experienced gamers, thanks to the adjustable difficulty level. 

• A FEAST FOR THE EARS: Fully voiced in English and German, with a thrilling soundtrack by Tim Grathwohl. 

• MADE IN GERMANY: Based on the popular Eldrador® Creatures toys by schleich®. 

What are you waiting for? Eldrador depends on you!
70010000081341.intro: The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace.
70010000081341.name: ELDRADOR® CREATURES SHADOWFALL

70010000081416.description:
Go Fight Fantastic is a 1-3 player hack n’ slash starring a crew of interstellar smugglers, led by their space-dog captain Bowie. When they stumble into an invasion during a mission to Bird Planet, they become the only hope of this once peaceful world. 

Team up in co-op (local and online) or switch between the different characters on-the-fly in solo play.

Story Mode

Fast-paced. Light-hearted. Vibrantly hand-drawn. Fight across treacherous marshlands, steep summits and picturesque settlements and meet an imaginative cast of friends and foes along the way. A unique touch is added to each playthrough by a degree of randomized level composition, enemy encounters, and upgrade drops.

Horde Mode

Fire up captain Bowie’s combat simulator and plow through an endless alien assault to climb the online leaderboards! Use the strengths of all your characters to prevail, pick powerups between the waves, and repeat. The longer you stay alive, the more challenging it gets.

Build Your Crew

Play as four different characters, each representing their own playstyle, and tailor them with persistent Meteorite upgrades found throughout the game. Want a Healer who can deal some serious damage? Or a Striker with poisonous blades? Have at it! 

Features:
- Choose from 4 characters that best suits your gaming style
- Engage in fast-paced combat with 1 to three players online or locally
- Explore the beautiful, hand-drawn vibrant world of Bird Planet
- Combine heroes' attacks into devastating combos
- Use Meteorites Upgrades to boost your stats and change the effects of your abilities
- Test your skills against waves of enemies in the endless Horde Mode
70010000081416.intro: Start an action-packed adventure solo or with friends!
70010000081416.name: Go Fight Fantastic!

70010000082261.description: Explore millions of possibilities in hero builds with 800+ item definitions and 30+ random modifiers. Discover a profound sense of progression through +50 hours of gameplay by acquiring quality loot.
70010000082261.intro: 3D rogue-like action game in a dark fantasy theme. Blow up thousands of malignants and find quality loot to improve your heroes for harder challenges.
70010000082261.name: Malignant Survivors

70010000088177.description:
On the run!

Mika Amamine, visits Rome to celebrate the end of exams only for her trip to turn upside down when she witnesses a murder and is arrested as a suspect. During transport, the police van overturns in an accident, freeing her and six other criminals, becoming fugitives.

Mysterious attackers appear, targeting her unique ability, and begin to pursue the group. Will the team unravel the clues and reclaim their normal lives?
70010000088177.name: Despera Drops

70010000088596.description:
Takeshi Kuranari, an ordinary college student, visits the underwater theme park LeMU. An accident occurs, trapping Takeshi and 6 other individuals inside LeMU, 51 meters below the surface. With no hope of rescue, Takeshi explores LeMU along with the mysterious girl Tsugumi and part-time employee You, searching for a way to escape to the surface. 
A theme park of dreams and hopes sunk in the depths of the mysterious blue ocean.
Can dreams and hopes still be found there? Or is there some other mystery lurking?
Overcoming one crisis after another, they search for a way to escape!

A masterpiece written by Kotaro Uchikoshi comes to Nintendo Switch™, 22 years after the initial Japanese release!
70010000088596.intro: To the promise we once made and the place we must return
70010000088596.name: Ever 17 - The Out of Infinity

70010000088598.description:
The protagonist, Makoto Ishihara, had the worst possible awakening. He had a dream in which a girl died a tragic death right in front of his eyes. The seminar training camp was supposed to go off without a hitch...or so Makoto believed.
April 6th.. The day everything changed. 
The uneasiness turned in to despair, and the premonition turned into calamity...
Will Makoto be able to stop the tragedy and see the light of the morning on Day 7?

A classic Sci-fi visual novel written by Kotaro Uchikoshi comes to Nintendo Switch™, 24 years after the initial Japanese release!
70010000088598.intro: Save me from this cage of infinity
70010000088598.name: Never 7 - The End of Infinity

70010000088772.description:
Enter the captivating world of Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! This thrilling game combines the challenge of tile matching with the beauty of anime-inspired artwork.

Match tiles to unveil breathtaking images and immerse yourself in a dark yet enchanting atmosphere. With multiple levels, adjustable difficulties, and mesmerizing visuals, the game offers an experience perfect for both casual players and puzzle enthusiasts.
Discover the passion, embrace the mystery, and let the stunning anime art guide your journey!
70010000088772.intro: Discover Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles! Match tiles to reveal stunning anime art and immerse yourself in mystery.
70010000088772.name: Dark Passion - Anime Match Puzzles

70010000089026.description:
Flight Simulator Pro 2024 puts you in the pilot’s seat for the most immersive flying experience yet. Whether you're cruising in a jumbo jet, tackling stormy skies in a private plane, or just enjoying a smooth sunset flight, every moment feels real and exciting.

With realistic flight physics, every takeoff and landing is a test of skill. Explore a massive open world with stunning cities, remote islands, and ever-changing weather that keeps you on your toes. From turbulence to shifting winds, no two flights are the same. Plus, you can tweak controls and settings to match your skill level—whether you're a pro pilot or just starting out.

So, strap in, push the throttle, and get ready to explore the skies in Flight Simulator Pro 2024!
70010000089026.intro: Take off, explore, and conquer the skies!
70010000089026.name: Flight Simulator Pro 2024

70010000090347.description:
In this interactive game experience, you step into the role of a small bird, soaring through breathtaking landscapes while collecting magical crystals that mark certain locations. The game is not about defeating enemies or overcoming dangerous obstacles, but rather about immersing yourself in a peaceful and tranquil environment. It is designed to relax your mind and soul, providing a soothing escape from the stresses of everyday life.
With no threats or enemies to worry about, you can fully focus on enjoying the beauty of the world around you and the sensation of flying freely. The game aims to give you a sense of liberation and lightness, offering the perfect retreat to unwind after a busy day and leave behind the rush of the outside world.
One of the unique features of this game is that you can select the level that best suits your desire to relax. The levels are designed to be completed quickly, so you can enjoy a short break if you're looking for a brief moment of peace. However, if you have more time and wish to explore, you can take a slower pace and dive deeper into the environment. This flexibility allows you to choose the experience that fits your needs, whether it's a short moment of calm or a longer, more immersive journey.
The game showcases a beautiful collection of some of the most stunning landscapes from the Aery franchise. These carefully crafted sceneries offer a visual oasis of tranquility, ranging from majestic mountains and vast forests to peaceful lakes and endless skies. Each scene is designed not only to delight the eyes but also to create an atmosphere of calm that invites you to relax.
We hope you enjoy the beautiful landscapes and that they help you unwind and find peace. So, sit back, take a deep breath, and let the magic of this world carry you away. It’s an invitation to give yourself a break and fully experience the present moment.
70010000090347.intro: Escape the daily hustle, feel the freedom of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful, peaceful landscapes
70010000090347.name: Aery - Dream Land

70010000091483.description:
Join Gunso, the skateboarding turtle, in a high-speed running game!
Chase after his beloved Koyuki-chan while jumping and guarding against obstacles!
Shake the controller to speed up and activate Fever Mode for an ultra-fast dash!
The more points you score, the more adorable photos of Gunso and friends you unlock!

Simple yet deep! Enjoy this addictive skateboard action game!

This should work well for an international audience! Let me know if you want any adjustments.
70010000091483.intro:
Skateboard × Turtle = Exciting Run Game!
Dash at full speed to meet Koyuki-chan!
Collect coins and activate Fever Dash!
70010000091483.name: Gunso's Skateboard Run

70010000091525.description:
A trip to the Dino Park may sound awesome…
…and it is…
…but what if that trip was also full of cats to find and pet?
If you have a penchant for seeking cats… the Dino Park would be thankful for your help with spotting them all! ^^

Game features:
- 500 cats to find (and little extra details, too!)
- A bunch of special cats to collect!
- Five levels, dense with friendly-looking, handmade drawings!
- Three adorable music tracks to make your game nice and cosy!
- Adjustable game colours, brightness, and contrast!
70010000091525.intro: Take a stroll to the Dino Park – among the dinosaurs, there’s a lot of cats!
70010000091525.name: Cats and Seek : Dino Park

70010000091720.description:
There are different types of races and now you can try a completely new and unusual sport. Jump on the trampolines and bounce higher and higher! 

Choose the exact moment to land and the steepest springboard to jump as high as possible and find out what is hidden behind the clouds.  

Each course has several levels, and the higher you can climb, the more valuable and interesting the prizes will be! 

Win all the races, collect all the bonuses and unlock all the funky skins for your hero. Have fun with crazy jumps and heights you can reach.    

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Take part in the funniest race ever!
70010000091720.intro: Jump high. Run fast. Win the race!
70010000091720.name: Jump Race

70010000092187.description:
[Peachy Girl's Adventure]
Experience the story of girl Natsuki joining the ""Ninja Racing Tournament"" with her friends to pay off her debt. A total of 16 chapters. 

[Humanoid Kart Racing]
Choose a girl and reach the finish line before the others.Use ninja tools to attack enemies.

[Let the Girls Dance]
In addition to racing, choose dances, outfits, and Japanese voice lines for the girls.
70010000092187.intro: 60FPS racing game where the girl Natsuki is forced to join the "Ninja Racing Tournament" to pay off her debt. 10 girls,100 dances anims, 600 voices, 16 chapters.
70010000092187.name: Peachy Derby

70010000092285.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Gangneung-si, Korea with "Real" footage! 
This work takes place in Gangneung-si, Samcheok-si, etc. 
There are a total of 11 flight courses. 
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to 11 locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Gangneung-si, Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000092285.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!
70010000092285.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Gangneung City

70010000094102.description:
Immerse yourself in Solid Void, a unique puzzle experience that merges two classic puzzle styles into one addictive journey. Start by solving intricate nonogram puzzles to complete the grid. Once your grid is complete, take the challenge to the next level by placing pentomino-like blocks to complete beautiful designs.

With its tranquil aesthetic, intuitive mechanics, and brain-bending puzzles, Solid Void offers many hours of rewarding gameplay. Whether you're a puzzle veteran or a casual gamer, this game promises to captivate your mind, spark your creativity, and leave you with breathtaking visual creations.

Can you master the Solid Void and bring nature's beauty to life?
70010000094102.intro:
Challenge your mind and creativity!
Solve beautiful puzzles!
Experience a journey of logic and design!
70010000094102.name: Solid Void - Nature Puzzles

70050000051066.description:
Pre-Order Bonus: 
Below are the benefits given to players that purchase Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars at an early time.
- 57300 potch
- Fortune Orb x1
- Prosperity Orb x1

Players can choose whether to start the game with the "DLC pack (57,300 potch / Fortune Orb / Prosperity Orb)" in your possession at the beginning of the "NEWGAME" for both Suikoden I and II
*potch: in-game currency
*Fortune Orb: Doubles the experience gained by the character that bears it
*Prosperity Orb: Doubles the "potch" gained when winning a battle with the character that bears it
*Suikoden I's MC cannot bear both runes
70050000051066.name: Special Item Pack (Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Pre-Order Bonus)

70050000054131.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate”! Clear the story to add Samayoi, the Wanderer from BAR Stella Abyss to your party!
70050000054131.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate

70050000054132.description: Unlocks “Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost”! Clear the story to add the Liar Princess from The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince to your party!
70050000054132.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost

70050000055094.intro:
More performance than the default skin.
【Bounty Derby】You can join the Bounty Derby with this skin.
【Ballroom】You can equip this skin from the dress list.
70050000055094.name: Saori - Grey Investigator

70050000055095.intro:
More performance than the default skin.
【Bounty Derby】You can join the Bounty Derby with this skin.
【Ballroom】You can equip this skin from the dress list.
70050000055095.name: Mirai - Manor Owner

70050000055096.intro:
More performance than the default skin.
【Bounty Derby】You can join the Bounty Derby with this skin.
【Ballroom】You can equip this skin from the dress list.
70050000055096.name: Minami - Back to School

70050000055097.intro:
More performance than the default skin.

70050000055097.name: Natsuki - From Outspace

70050000055098.intro:
More performance than the default skin.
【Bounty Derby】You can join the Bounty Derby with this skin.

70050000055099.name: Mephisto - Demon Maid

70050000055100.intro:
More performance than the default skin.
【Bounty Derby】You can join the Bounty Derby with this skin.
【Ballroom】You can equip this skin from the dress list.
